body: That would be a nice enhancement, and probably not too tricky - fancy having a go?
I'm afraid I wouldn't have the programming ability, I just hope someone else thinks it's important enough and has the time to work on it. I appreciate the work you've done with rclone.
I think implementing this should be a matter of running `ListDir` on the folders to find the largest so it should be very easy if someone would like to have a go.

Hi, I figured I could try to solve this issue but I'm having troubles in running the tests to the dedupe operation. I get a bunch of errors saying "error listing: directory not found" and tests are being skipped, any idea why?

@asiamarek this is how I would run the tests - is that what you are doing?

```
~/go/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/operations$ go test -v -run Dedup -remote TestDrive:
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateInteractive
2018/09/18 15:51:02 NOTICE: one: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
2018/09/18 15:51:02 NOTICE: one: Deleting 2/3 identical duplicates (MD5 "0f6d3e59c45e54d0f2cb30fb594620a3")
2018/09/18 15:51:04 NOTICE: one: All duplicates removed
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateInteractive (9.60s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateSkip
2018/09/18 15:51:10 NOTICE: one: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
2018/09/18 15:51:10 NOTICE: one: Deleting 1/2 identical duplicates (MD5 "0f6d3e59c45e54d0f2cb30fb594620a3")
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateSkip (7.25s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateFirst
2018/09/18 15:51:17 NOTICE: one: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
2018/09/18 15:51:18 NOTICE: one: Deleted 2 extra copies
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateFirst (6.72s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateNewest
2018/09/18 15:51:23 NOTICE: one: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
2018/09/18 15:51:24 NOTICE: one: Deleted 2 extra copies
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateNewest (7.25s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateOldest
2018/09/18 15:51:31 NOTICE: one: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
2018/09/18 15:51:32 NOTICE: one: Deleted 2 extra copies
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateOldest (7.90s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateLargest
2018/09/18 15:51:39 NOTICE: one: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
2018/09/18 15:51:40 NOTICE: one: Deleted 2 extra copies
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateLargest (8.50s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
=== RUN   TestDeduplicateRename
2018/09/18 15:51:48 NOTICE: one.txt: Found 3 duplicates - deleting identical copies
--- PASS: TestDeduplicateRename (9.25s)
    run.go:173: Remote "Google drive root 'rclone-test-cezoyik7tahikoy0livedit8'", Local "Local file system at /tmp/rclone201398783", Modify Window "1ms"
PASS
ok  	github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/operations	57.699s
```

Yeah i was doing something wrong, sorry about that, now it's working perfectly. Thanks !

As i said i want to try to solve this issue :)

> Yeah i was doing something wrong, sorry about that, now it's working perfectly. Thanks !
> 
> As i said i want to try to solve this issue :)

No worries, and thank you - looking forward to the PR :-)

issue.title: fs/operations: optimize choosing the main folder in dedup - fixes #2568

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
Fix to  #2568 issue.

I used a different function ('Size()') than @ncw suggested in the issue comments, but if I understand the code correctly, it should give us exactly the information we need.
